title: MASTODON - Blood Mountain [2006] [Progressive Sludge] [VBR]
description:
Blood Mountain is the third full-length studio album by metal band Mastodon. The recording of the album finished in April, 2006 .The album includes guest appearances by Scott Kelly of Neurosis on "Crystal Skull", Joshua Homme of Queens of the Stone Age on "Colony of Birchmen", as well as keyboardist Isaiah "Ikey" Owens and singer Cedric Bixler-Zavala of The Mars Volta on "Pendulous Skin" and "Siberian Divide", respectively.




   MASTODON - Blood Mountain [2006] [VBR]
